titles.title: He leadeth me! O blessed thought

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sometimes ’mid scenes of deepest gloom, Sometimes where Eden’s bowers bloom, By waters still, o’er troubled sea, Still ’tis His hand that leadeth me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And when my task on earth is done, When, by Thy grace, the vict’ry’s won, E’en death’s cold wave I will not flee, Since Thou in triumph leadest me.{/lang-eng}
